It updates billing records based on adjustments from a staging table and marks these adjustments as processed. The procedure is part of a larger billing system, used to ensure that billing records reflect the most current and accurate data after adjustments have been made.

The complexity level of this stored procedure is medium. It involves multiple SQL operations, including SELECT, UPDATE, and conditional logic. The procedure interacts with several tables and uses joins to ensure data consistency and integrity. The complexity is increased by the need to handle business logic related to billing adjustments and the use of audit triggers.

CREATE PROCEDURE [CrisNationalGridWest].[usp_CRIS_ProcessAccountBillingRebilledAdjustment] @AuthenticatedUserID int , @StatusCode int  OUTPUT
   
 AS --**************************************************************************************
--* Name:         
--*
--* Description:  
--* 
--
--*               
--* Exec:  		 usp_ProcessAccountBillingSaveCanceRebillAdjustments
--*
--* Parameter(s):         
--*			       AuthenticatedUserID int Output
--*                StatusCode  int output       -  Execution Return Status 
--*
--* Database:     OEC
--*
--* Return:	    0 Success
--*                   9 Failure
--*
--* AUTHOR:       Peter Heller (PAH)
--* Created On:   10/26/2005
--**************************************************************************************
--* Date         Tech Description of Change
--* ---------- ----  -------------------------------------------------------------
--* 07/06/2010 PAH  First Version  
--* 08/30/2011 PAH  RevisedGasChargeAmount = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.GasChargeAmount
--***************************************************************************************
Begin 
--************************************************************************************** 
--Declare Variables                                            
--**************************************************************************************
--
declare @NumberOfAdjustmentsAdded int
declare @CurrentBillingPeriod varchar(8)
declare @AccountInvoiceBillingGroup int 
declare @UtilityCompanySeqid int
--
declare @HasAccountBillingAdjustmentGasBeenProcessed int
declare @HasAccountBillingGasBeenProcessed int
declare @HasAccountBillingBeenProcessed int
--
declare @BillingAccountBillingCrisGasUpdateTransactionCount int
declare @BillingAccountBillingUpdateTransactionCount int 
--
declare @BillingAccountBillingGasInsertTransactionCount int
declare @BillingAccountBillingInsertTransactionCount int 
declare @AccountBillingCrisGasIsProcessedTransactionCount int 
--
--**************************************************************************************  
--SET DEFAULTS                                                  
--**************************************************************************************
--
--************************************************************************************** 
--	Main Processing
--**************************************************************************************
-- Remove after testing
--delete from Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas 
--DBCC CHECKIDENT ('Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas', RESEED,0)
--
-- Get all of the generalized parameters needed to process the account billing from the Gas.UploadAccountBillingAdjustmentGas
--
--		@CurrentBillingPeriod = BillingPeriod 
--		@AccountInvoiceBillingGroup=InvoiceAccountBillingGroupSeqid 
--		@UtilityCompanySeqid=UtilityCompanySeqid
--
SELECT	TOP (1)	@CurrentBillingPeriod = BillingPeriod, 
				@AccountInvoiceBillingGroup=AccountInvoiceBillingGroup, 
				@UtilityCompanySeqid=UtilityCompanySeqid
FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas
--
--
select	@HasAccountBillingBeenProcessed = COUNT(*)
FROM     
		Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas INNER JOIN
		Billing.AccountBilling ON Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid AND 
		Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.OriginalAccountNumber = Billing.AccountBilling.OriginalAccountNumber AND 
		Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.BillingPeriod = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod AND 
		Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision
WHERE 
		(Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.BillingPeriod = @CurrentBillingPeriod) AND 
		(Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.UtilityCompanySeqid = @UtilityCompanySeqid) and 
		(Billing.AccountBilling.CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup = @AccountInvoiceBillingGroup)
--
-- if this occurs "isnull(@HasAccountBillingBeenProcessed,1)= 0" then set the value to 1 or @HasAccountBillingBeenProcessed > 0 Then do not process
--
if (isnull(@HasAccountBillingBeenProcessed,1)= 0)
   BEGIN
		--
		--	National Grid West Special Ledger current period discount.
		--	RevisedBilledAmount =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.RevisedBilledAmount+Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.DiscountedAmount
		--	Note:
		--			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.DiscountedAmount is zero for Con Ed and National Grid West CRIS accounts
		--
		UPDATE  Billing.AccountBilling
		SET     LastPeriodModified = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingPeriod,         
				FromDate =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.FromDate, 
				ToDate =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.ToDate, 
				AccountBillingStatus =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.AccountBillingStatus,
				PreviousAccountBillingStatus =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.PreviousAccountBillingStatus, 
				AccountBillingStatusCodePeriod =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.AccountBillingStatusCodePeriod, 
				RevisedBilledAmount =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.RevisedBilledAmount,
				AccountEnergyUsage =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.RevisedTherms, 
				NetEnergyUsageChange =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.NetChangeTherms,
				NetDollarChange = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.NetChangeDollars,
				BillingPeriodDays =Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingDays,  
				SplitFiscalYear = dbo.[IsFiscalYearSplit] (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.ToDate), -- SplitFiscalYear
				ChargeToFiscalYear = dbo.[CalculateFiscalYearIfSplit] (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.ToDate,'T'), --ChargeToFiscalYear 	
				ChargeToPriorFiscalYear = dbo.[CalculateFiscalYearIfSplit] (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.ToDate,'F'), -- ChargeToPriorFiscalYear
				LastUpdate = getdate(),
				FireAuditTrigger = 'Y'
		FROM     
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas INNER JOIN
				Billing.AccountBilling ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid AND 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.UtilityCompanySeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.UtilityCompanySeqid AND 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision
		WHERE 
				(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingPeriod = @CurrentBillingPeriod) and 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.IsProcessed='N'

--
		set @BillingAccountBillingUpdateTransactionCount = @@rowcount
		print 'Update AccountBillingUpdateTransactionCount: '+str(@BillingAccountBillingUpdateTransactionCount)
		--
		--
		-- Update the adjustments first since the Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas for the current period
		-- has indetified all of the adjustments that exist in EC3.  The Billing.AccountBilling AccountBillingSeqid
		-- is not null and the Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas AccountBillingGasSeqid is not null.
		-- 
		-- The key to this update is the setting of the LastUpdate to a null value so the audit trigger preserves
		-- the prior state of the row before the Billing.AccountBilling or Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas are updated
		-- with the adjusted values.
		--
		--  Note: Legacy MiscellaneousChargeAmount,AccountArrears, BalanceDollars & CreditDollars will never be adjusted.
		--
		update		Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas
		SET         OldCrisLegacyAccountBillingAdjustmentGasSeqid = null,
					LastPeriodModified = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingPeriod, 
					BilledCCF = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.RevisedCCF, 
					ThermFactor = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.ThermFactor, 
					BilledTherms = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.RevisedTherms, 
					Notes = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.Notes, 
					AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGasSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGasSeqid, 
					LastUpdate = GETDATE(), 
					FireAuditTrigger = 'Y', 
					NumberOfMeters = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.NumberOfMeters, 
					CommodityChargeAmount = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.CommodityChargeAmount, 
					DeliveryChargeAmount = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.DeliveryChargeAmount,
					MTACommodityTax = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.MTACommodityTax,
					MTADeliveryTax = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.MTADeliveryTax, 
					SalesTax = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.SalesTax, 
					SystemBenefitsCharge = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.SystemBenefitsCharge, 
					RetailDecouplingMechanismCharge = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.RetailDecouplingMechanismCharge, 
					DeliveryRateSurcharge = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.DeliveryRateSurcharge, 
					RealTimeNormalizationCharge = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.RealTimeNormalizationCharge, 
					LatePaymentCharge = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.LatePaymentCharge, 
					PaperBillCharge = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.PaperBillCharge, 
					--MiscellaneousChargeAmount = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.MiscellaneousChargeAmount, 
					--MiscellaneousChargeType = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.MiscellaneousChargeType,
					GasRateCode = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.GasRateCode,
					RevisedGasChargeAmount = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.RevisedGasChargeAmount
		FROM 
					Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas INNER JOIN
					Billing.AccountBilling ON Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid AND 
					Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
					Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod INNER JOIN
					Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas ON Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.AccountBillingSeqid AND 
					Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod = Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.BillingPeriod AND 
					Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
					Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.AccountBillingCrisGasSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.AccountBillingCrisGasSeqid
		WHERE 
					(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingPeriod = @CurrentBillingPeriod)  and 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.IsProcessed='N'



      	--									           
		set @BillingAccountBillingCrisGasUpdateTransactionCount = @@rowcount
   		print 'Update AccountBillingCrisGasUpdateTransactionCount: '+str(@BillingAccountBillingCrisGasUpdateTransactionCount)
   		--
   		update	Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas
   		set		IsProcessed='Y'
		FROM     
					Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas INNER JOIN
					Billing.AccountBilling ON Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid AND 
					Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision INNER JOIN
					Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas ON 
					Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingPeriodRevision AND 
					Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.AccountBillingSeqid AND 
					Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas.AccountBillingCrisGasSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.AccountBillingCrisGasSeqid
		WHERE 
					(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.BillingPeriod = @CurrentBillingPeriod) AND 
					(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas.IsProcessed = 'N')      
			
--									           
		set @AccountBillingCrisGasIsProcessedTransactionCount = @@rowcount
   		print 'Is Processed AccountBillingCrisGas Update TransactionCount: '+str(@AccountBillingCrisGasIsProcessedTransactionCount)
   		--
end
			
--
set @StatusCode = 0

End
